value.title: Maintain Tab Order for Power BI Report
value.excerpt: During this session, we will talk about how we can maintain Tab Order for Power BI Report. From a report accessibility standpoint, it is necessary to maintain tab order for our Power BI Report. Sometimes when end users are accessing the Power BI Report, they are using keyboard key “Tab” to move between
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DMce0qKA_Kg" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Make a Table Visualization to Display All Observations from Data Source in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, I’m demonstrating how we can show all the records even if it is the same as the Power BI table. We all know that the Power BI table visual automatically removes the duplicate rows from end-users in the table. But sometimes we need to show the end-users all the values from the data source

value.title: New way to compare Date and DateTime Value in Power BI - August 2021 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more new update from Power BI Desktop. Sometimes we need to compare date or DateTime value in our DAX expression. At that time, we are using Date() function and Time() function. Now, there's one more easy way to compare Date and Time value in Power BI which is using "dt" keyword before

value.title: Power BI Tip - Stop Visual Interactions at Report Level in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can stop the interaction between the visualization. In Power BI, whenever we select any visual data point, it filters other visuals based on the selected data point. Sometimes there is a requirement, where we don’t need the filtering functionality on selected data

value.title: Power Query Tip - Add Sequential Number using the Index Column in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn, how we can easily add the sequence for the rows using the PowerQuery. In Power Query we can add the sequence number using the Index. Let’s see how to add the Index column in the Power BI.  If you really like this video don’t forget to subscribe to my channel. ***************

value.title: Show/Hide Multiple Data Values using TME AG Toggle Switch – Custom Visual – Toggle Switch by TME AG

value.title: Small Multiples in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session on Small Multiples in Power BI. “Small Multiples”- a new feature rolled out during December 2020 Power BI Desktop Update.
